text: Sihamte ka’le, ‘tumi amara ocarata ahara agate'o ami niryatita haicho arau tumi ahara pichato’. Te'om ka’le, ‘ati sonakale tomalokara pratipalake tomalokara satrauka dhbansa karaiba arau te'om tomalokaka prthiraita sthalabhisikta karaiba, tara pichata tomaloke ki karaa seya te'om laksya karaiba’
